cause.description:
Our donations go to the nonprofit HeroBox Inc.
HeroBox is a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization that provides custom support to American soldiers. Their mission is to create and manage sponsorships between deployed American soldiers and generous individuals and organizations and their goal is to sponsor every deployed American soldier.
http://www.herobox.org/
1. Our troops deserve our upmost respect and appreciation.
cause.mission: To show the troops we love, support, and appreciate them.
cause.name: Support the Troops!
